text: Falone Sumaili is a Burundian female footballer who plays for English club Bradford City, as a striker. ==Career== Sumaili began her career in her native Burundi, where she played for their national team. She moved to England as a refugee and signed for Bradford City in 2018. She scored a hat-trick on the opening day of the 2019–20 season. ==References== Category:Date of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Burundian women's footballers Category:Burundi women's international footballers Category:Bradford City W.F.C. players Category:Women's association football forwards Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Falone Sumaili
